1.content:
Mia is a 14 year old who is a child prodigy but a trip to her Aunts house leaves her thinking differently.

Kayla is 18 and just got her first job cleaning houses but her boss will help her see she's just not as big and smart as she thinks she is.

Layla is 9 along with her younger siblings she will be babysat for the weekend. Layla is a nice average 9 year old who like to help with her younger siblings but now maybe her siblings will help with her thanks to the new baby sitter.

Sandra is 12 her family is very wealthy thanks to her parents odd inventions. Sanders likes to play with them and the nanny wouldn't mind having baby sandra back around the house.
1.title: Choose your path....

11.content:
Mia was a Prodigy, a Prodigy in several things in fact, Music, Art, Sports, Math... But that all changed on a Fateful Visit to her Aunt's House.

Mia's Aunt Agatha had a Plan, a Plan to remind her Niece she's still very much a Child.

How does Mia end up Babied?
11.title: Mia

111.content: So Mia will end up Regressed, But by what Means?
111.title: Regression

1111.content:
Unknown to Mia, Aunt Aggie has access to Magic

What kind of Magical Thing Regresses Mia?
1111.title: Magic!

choices: Mia gets there late almost 7 o'clock
Its early one last day as a normal 14 year old
11111.content:
Mia was happy to go see her aunt Aggie, as Mia calls her, but was kinda upset that her parents didn't see her as old enough to take care of her self for the next 2 weeks while her parents were away. Mia's parents let Aggie know in advance that Mia was a little upset about her stay and told her that she may deal with it as she sees fit. They all know Mia is a reasonable kid and is never hostile but can become kinda whiny and withdrawn when she feels upset.
Aggie feels that the young prodigy get these feeling because she thinks she's more mature than what she is. So before Mia and her parents show up Aggie puts a spell on Mia's bed and smiles as she recites the spell...

"Now and for every 40 winks the young Mia will have soon this bed she will be regiven a tick of youth, may her each sleep remind her of the child she really is! From her childhood will return her clothes, her habits, her tendencies and even her youth! FOR EACH DAY SHE WAKE UP MORE LIKE THE CHILD SHE REALLY IS!" And with that the pink and purple bedding now enchanted shined bright for a moment the dulled back to normal. Not a moment later Aggie smiled as she heard her niece ring her doorbell!
11111.title: A Magic Spell

choices: If it has started, it's not noticable yet.
11112.content:
Mia's Parents will be out of town for about 3 weeks, so she'll be Staying with her Aunt Aggie.

After a few hour car ride Mia and her parents arrive, they unload Mia's Suitcases and briefly chat with Aggie before they leave for their flight.

Aggie helps Mia being her things inside and shows her to the room she'll be staying in.

After unpacking everything Aggie offers Mia a Glass of Iced Tea, Mia's Parched after the car ride and it is Summer, so she readily accepts.

Aunt Aggie pours 2 Tall Glasses of Iced Tea, But unknown to Mia she Spiked one with a Magic Potion designed to Regress the Teen.

Aggie brings over the Glasses to Mia who's on the couch watching some TV. Mia Eagerly Starts Gulping down the Refreshing, Sweet Liquid. Soon she's finished off the Glass, she was REALLY thirsty.

Does Mia begin Regress Immediately or does it take a bit to start?
11112.title: A Magic Potion

1111232.content:
Mia soon starts feeling a little dizzy, she turns and lies down on the couch, rubbing her head, but soon passes out.

When she Awakens, she's in:
1111232.title: She Passes Out

11112322.content:
Mia slowly comes back to conciousness, though a bit groggy.

Sitting up and rubbing her eyes she notices she's in a bedroom of some sort, abelit one decorated for a much younger girl than her.

She then looks to her side and notices the Bed she's in has rails on the side, like the kind you'd find on a little kid's bed to keep them from falling out.

She hasn't quite Noticed Yet, but soon she'll find out she's regressed to the age of:
11112322.title: A Bed with Rails (3-5)

choices: Training Pants! Well at least it's not a Diaper.
Whew, Panties, Childish ones, but still Panties
111123221.content:
Mia soon realizes something's up, it's weird, but everything looks... Bigger?

She Hops out of bed, when she then notices she's wearing Feetie Pajamas, her aunt Changed her clothes in her sleep?

She heads to the door, where she soon realizes the Doorknob is a lot higher than it used to be.

Taking a step back to inspect things, she spies a Mirror on the other side of the room.

As she heads toward it, she's shock at her reflection.

Instead of a 14 Year old Girl, Staring back at her is a Pudgy Toddler, maybe 3 years old!

She then tilts her eyes down a little, she hesitantly pulls at the waistband of her PJ pants, and looks within to find:

choices: Not yet, but Tea really goes through ya.
1111232211.content: Mia is Shocked, staring back at her is the Epitome of Babyhood, a Diaper. Is it at least Dry?
1111232211.title: A Cushy, Fluffy, Babyish Diaper

11112322112.content:
''Oh no, a diaper...this can't be happening.'' Mia thinks when she sees that her undies have been replaced by a baby diaper. And to make matters even worse, she inspects it closer and to her horror she realizes that the diaper is also completely soaked. The diaper's formerly white color has now turned noticeably yellow and it sags heavily between her legs.

As she's inspecting the soaked diaper...
11112322112.title: Nope, Soaked

choices: Yep, but unfortunately Tea makes you Pee
1111232212.content: She Finds herself wearing a Pair of Training pants, but are they Dry?
1111232212.title: Training Pants! Well at least it's not a Di...

choices: Mia Goes to look for her Aunt
The Tea has caught up to Mia, she needs to Pee, BAD.
1111232213.content:
Mia is relieved to see she's still in Panties, Childish ones a Little Kid would wear, and a little Thick, but Panties nonetheless.

What Happens Next?
1111232213.title: Whew, Panties, Childish ones, but still Panties

11112322132.content:
Mia immediately realizes something Alarming. She needs to pee, BAD.

She rushes Over to the door as fast as her shrunken legs can carry her, hurriedly pulling it open.

Once she's in the Hallway she starts frantically searching for the Bathroom.
11112322132.title: The Tea has caught up to Mia, she needs to Pee,...

choices: Mia starts Crying like a Toddler
111123221322.content:
While running down the hall, checking doors for the bathroom, Mia suddenly feels a warm wetness running down her legs.

She can't believe it, she wet herself, she hadn't done that since that one time in Preschool.

What happens next?
111123221322.title: She Has an Accident

choices: Mia Runs off to find her Aunt
1111232213221.content:
Maybe because of the regression, or maybe just because of how shocking everything that just happened was, Mia starts Crying like a Real Toddler.

It starts slow, but soon Mia finds herself unable to hold back her tears and begins to weep uncontrollably.

What Happens Next?
1111232213221.title: Mia starts Crying like a Toddler

choices: Another Accident Mimi?(act like this is Normal)
Nothing, she just scoops her up
11112322132211.content:
Aunt Aggie hears the Cries of her Newly Toddlerified Niece, and rushes to see what's wrong.

She finds her standing in the hall, a puddle beneath her, and an obvious Wet spot on her PJ Pants.

She Kneels down and lays a hand on Mia's shoulder to comfort her, and says:
11112322132211.title: Mia's Aunt Comes to her

111123221322111.content:
"Another Accident Mimi?" Her Aunt Comfortingly says to Mia, who is shocked to hear her Childhood Nickname again, and what does she mean by "Another Accident"?

Her Aunt Picks up the Girl, careful to avoid getting herself wet, and carries her back to the room she awoke in.

She grabs a towel off a shelf and spreads it on the Bed to protect it before sitting the girl on top.

Aunt Aggie goes over to the Dresser and says "That's the Third Strike little Missy, I know you want to wear you Big Girl Panties, but I can't keep cleaning up wet spots, clothes and sheets."

Mia is even more Confused as to what her aunt is going on about before her Aunt turns around, having found what she's looking for, a pair of Sweatpants and a:
111123221322111.title: Another Accident Mimi?(act like this is Normal)

choices: Her Aunt Holds her down and Diapers her
Her Aunt Relents and puts her in Pullups
1111232213221112.content:
Mia sees her Aunt holding a White Rectangle, which she soon recognizes as the Emblem of Babyhood, a Diaper.

Covered in Bright, Cartoonish Designs, the thick, white, puffy underpants of a rugrat who uses their pants as a toilet.

Mia immediately realizes what's about to happen, she protests "I don need diapers!", Before covering her mouth, shocked at her Childish Voice and slight lisp.

Her Aunt responds "Mimi you know the rules, 3 Accidents and it's Back to Diapers, we'll try with Pullups again Tomorrow."

Mia, or Mimi as she guesses she is now, Continues to protest, eventually:
1111232213221112.title: Diaper

11112322132211121.content:
Aggie, Having Wrangled quite a few Tantruming Toddlers over the years, has no problem handling Mia.

Meanwhile Mia doesn't even realize that what she's doing as the Protests of a 14 Year Old Teenager devolve into the Tantrum of a 3 Year Old Toddler.

Aggie Grabs the Changing Supplies and brings them over to the bed.

Aggie Skillfullly Holds Mia gently down by her chest as she flails her arms shouting "No Diaper!".

She pulls off the Girl's Wet PJ pants and Panties with one swift motion, before Unfolding the Diaper, lifting Mia's Legs and sliding it under her.

She Uses some wipes to clean her up, applies some cream and powder, and Tapes Mia up nice and snug.

After she finishes she says "All done" and gives Mia a little pat on her Padded Bum.

Mia snaps out of her tantrum, shocked both at realizing she just threw a Tantrum like the toddler she's Become, but that her Aunt had also diapered her during it.

Mia begins Calming down, "Maybe this is all a Nightmare", she hopes to herself. She sits up as Aunt Aggie gives her a Hug.

What Happens Next?
11112322132211121.title: Her Aunt Holds her down and Diapers her

111123221322111211.content:
Aggie leaves "Mimi" who has clamed down signifigantly from hee tantrum, in the Room to play while she cleans up her accident.

She Leaves the Sweatpants on the bed Incase Mia wants to wear them.

Once Her aunt is out of the Room, What does Mia do?
111123221322111211.title: Aggie leaves her to play

111123221322111212.content:
As Mia calms down, her Aunt rubbing her back and generally being Comforting.

Aggie decides to make "Mimi" feel better she'll get Ice Cream after Dinner.

Mia's Teenager side doesn't want to go out, but Mimi's Toddler side really wants Ice Cream, and eventually the toddler inside her wins.

Aggie helps Mia into the Sweatpants, then carries her into the den and plops her on the couch to wait while she cleans up her Accident.

The TV is playing Cartoons, "but at least they're not the ones for babies", Mia thinks to herself.

About 10 minutes later her Aunt is back for her. She turns off the TV, which startles Mia a little as she got more absorbed than she thought.

Aggie picks up her Niece and Carries her out to the car, placing her in a Carseat and buckling her in securely.

Where do they go to eat?
111123221322111212.title: Aggie promises her Ice Cream.

1111232213221112121.content:
Aggie drives to McDonalds, which isn't very far from her house.

As soon as she sees the Sign Mia's toddler side overtakes her once more and she excitedly shouts "McDonalds!".

Aggie parks her car, grabs the Diaper Bag and Unbuckles Mia.

She helps Mia to the Ground and holds her hand. Mia feels silly doing it but yet it also gives her an odd feeling of security.

The two of them walk inside, Mia Toddling between her Diaper and Stiff Shoes.

Upon noticing the Playplace Mia feels her Inner Toddler pulling her toward it.

As they walk in the door Aunt Aggie asks "Mimi" what she wants. Mia never really liked McDonalds, but has a Craving for Chicken Nuggets.

Mia starts to say "Chicken Nuggets" Calmly but ends up excitedly saying "Chicken Nuggets!", And then blushes a bit about it.

Aggie giggles and then tells her she can go play while she waits in line. Mia tries to Resist but the Allure of the Playplace is Too Strong and she excitedly rushes off.

Once Inside it's like Mia's Inner Toddler takes Control of her Body as Teen Mia can only watch, she Excitedly climbs, crawls and slides around in the plastic paradise.

What Happens Next?
1111232213221112121.title: McDonalds(with a Playplace!)

11112322132211121211.content: While in the Playplace another Kid Interacts with Mia, but are they Friendly or Mean?
11112322132211121211.title: Another Kid talks to Mia

11112322132211121212.content:
As she's playing Mia suddenly feels a familiar pressure in her bladder. A part of her realizes that she should probably go to her aunt and tell her she needs to go potty. But the toddler part of her wants to keep playing, so she ignores the need to use the toilet for now. ''I'll play for a little while longer and then go to the potty like a big girl!'' she thinks to herself.

A while later the need to pee has grown even bigger and Mia is now doing the potty dance. Mia...
11112322132211121212.title: Mia has to go potty

choices: Her Aunt rushes her to the Bathroom
Her Aunt tells her to wet her diaper
111123221322111212123.content:
Mia rushes through the tubes and down the slide to find her Aunt, luckily she just happened to have gotten the food and was about to Call for her.

Mia runs over to her Aunt who sees her coming as she's putting the food on the table. Mia, Really needing to Go at this Point, maybe a bit loudly Tells her Aunt "POTTY!".

How does her Aunt Respond?
111123221322111212123.title: Goes to find her aunt

choices: The Dam Breaks and she has an accident
She Runs off to try and find the Potty on her own
1111232213221112121232.content:
Her Aunt shockingly responds to Mia's plea by telling her to wet herself!

She tells her it's okay and they can try Potty Training again Tomorrow, but for the rest of Today she'll have to use her diapers.

How does Mia React?
1111232213221112121232.title: Her Aunt tells her to wet her diaper

choices: Her Aunt says "Lets get you to the Potty before you SPRING A LEAK"
1111232213221112121233.title: SE

choices: Aggie leaves Mimi in the wet diaper to eat
11112322132211121212331.content:
Her Aunt sees the Tiny Girl doing her Potty Dance, Clearly in need of a Bathroom, if her Shouting "POTTY!" Didn't make it clear.

Aggie picks up Mimi and begins Carrying her Swiftly towards the Bathroom, as she does this, she says "Lets Get you to the Potty quick before you Spring a Leak".

Upon hearing the Phrase "Spring a Leak", Something in Mia's Subconcious Clicks without her knowing, and suddenly what little resistance her Bladder was putting up disappears.

Soon Mia feels her Diaper Growing Warm and Wet as the urine spreads across the front of her diaper and is quickly wicked up by the awaiting padding.

Mia grabs her Aunt's arm, her Toddler side unable to keep from Tearing up at her accident.

Aggie notices this and immediately realizes what's wrong. She rubs the girl's back and comforts her, saying it's okay.

What happens Next?
11112322132211121212331.title: Her Aunt says "SPRING A LEAK"

111123221322111212123312.content:
Aggie hugs her niece a little and turns back toward the table, they didn't manage to get very far.

She makes her way over and sets Mimi down in a chair.

Mia, still processing her second Accident Today, can only shyly ask "Change?".

Her Aunt responds "Not yet sweetie, that Diaper can still hold a couple more accidents"

Mia blushes at this as her Aunt hands her her Happy Meal.

Mia shyly opens it and begins eating, smiling a little as her toddler side enjoys Nuggies.

After Eating:
111123221322111212123312.title: Aggie leaves Mimi in the wet diaper to eat

choices: They just left the Playplace Area
She's Just been Buckled into her Carseat
1111232213221112121233121.content:
Finishing up her food, Aggie looks over to her niece, who has statred playing with the toy that came with her happy meal.

Getting out a couple wipes from the Diaper bag, she begins to clean up Mimi's Face.

Mia is broken out of her trance as her aunt wipes her face clean, she's a bit shocked that she lost herself in playing like that.

Her aunt Takes the trash and throws it away, depositing the tray on top as you do before coming back to get her.

Her aunt helps her down and they beging to leave.

As they're leaving Mia feels an ominous rumbling in her bowels, she has to poop!

How far along are they when this happens?
1111232213221112121233121.title: Mia needs to Poop

choices: Her Aunt says "Well Let's get you to the Potty before you MAKE A STINKY"

As they exit the Playplace Area, Aggie turns to go order the Ice Cream she Promised when she's interuppted by Mia, who suddenly feels the need to go again.

Mia looks up at her Aunt and says "Potty!" With Urgency.

Her Aunt asks her if she needs to pee again.

Mia responds by shaking her head no and saying "Poopie!", Blushing at what she just said.

What happens next?
11112322132211121212331211.title: They just left the Playplace Area

choices: A Change, Ice Cream, then Home
She leaves Mimi in her Dirty Diaper?
111123221322111212123312112.content:
Her Aunt responds to her Niece's Request by replying, "Let's get you to the potty before you make a stinky then."

Once again, something in Mia's Subconcious gives way upon hearing her aunt say: "Make a Stinky".

Mia's already limited control of her bowels as a toddler instantly fails, and soon she instinctively squats as she begins messing her diaper.

Mia starts tearing up again, her Aunt picking her up and rocking her as she finishes her accident.

What Happens Next?
111123221322111212123312112.title: Her Aunt says MAKE A STINKY

choices: Mimi eats her Ice Cream as they Drive Back Home
Mimi falls asleep in her Carseat
1111232213221112121233121121.content:
Her Aunt swiftly carries her to the Bathroom, pulling down the Changing Table from the wall.

She Lays Mimi down and pulls down her Sweatpants before Beginning to change her Poopy Diaper.

Mia blushes Heavily throughout the whole Process.

Unknown to her, her Aunt is Pleased with how well Mimi's Regression is coming along, the Hypnotic Triggers worked Perfectly.

Her Aunt Wipes her Down Good and Soon she's Powdered and Taped up into a New Diaper.

Her Aunt helps her Pull up her Sweatpants and helps her off the Changing Station.

Afterward she Leads Mia out and They Stand in line to get Ice Cream.

It feels like an Eternity for Mia after the Mortification of Pooping Her Diaper like a Baby.

After a bit of waiting they get their Ice Cream, Mia's Toddler side eagerly Grabbing the cone from her Aunt.

Soon afterward Mia is Strapped into her Carseat, Preoccupied with eating the Ice Cream, and they head home.

What Happens Next?
1111232213221112121233121121.title: A Change, Ice Cream, then Home

On the way home, not long after Mimi finishes eating her Ice Cream, she suddenly gets a bit sleepy.

Between her full tummy and the gentle bumpiness from the road, Mia's Toddler Body can't resist the call of Slumber.

Soon she's Off to Dreamland.

When she wakes up:
11112322132211121212331211212.title: Mimi falls asleep in her Carseat

choices: They've just pulled into the driveway
She's being carried in by her Aunt
She's being changed into a Nighttime Diaper

What's going on when she comes to?

Mia wakes up from her catnap in her Aunt's Arms, being carried inside.

As Mia continues to be carried they pass through the Kitchen Mia looks at the clock, finding that it's a little bit past 5:00 PM.

When they reach the den Her Aunt lets Mia out of her arms.

"I've got some Boring Grown-Up work to do so I'll be in my office if you need anything" her aunt says

"I'll call you when it's bathtime(6:30) so you can play until then okay?" Her aunt adds.

Mia's Teenager half doesn't like her tone, but she Begrudgingly Nods understandingly.

After Her aunt leaves her to her own devices, what does Mia do?
1111232213221112121233121121212.title: She's being carried in by her Aunt

choices: She watches some All-Ages Cartoons, like Spongebob
She gets sucked into some show for Preschoolers, like Sesame Street
11112322132211121212331211212121.content:
Mia grabs the TV remote off the Coffee table before climbing up onto the couch, blushing as it causes her diaper to crinkle.

She sits down and gets comfortable before turning on the TV.

She decides to try and channel surf, since she doesn't remember what Channel is what at her Aunt's Place.

Unfortunately it looks like the TV's been set so she can only watch Cartoons and Kids Stuff.

While annoyed by this, she still wants to watch TV.

What does she End Up Watching?
11112322132211121212331211212121.title: She turns on the TV

choices: She realizes she wet herself while watching TV
111123221322111212123312112121212.content:
While trying to figure out what to watch, Mia leaves the channel where it is.

As she's thinking the show comes back from commerical, It's Sesame Street!

She glances over at the tv for a second, and soon is Distracted by Elmo and Big Bird on the screen.

Her Big Girl brain enters a weird fuzzy state as her toddler brain intently watches the show.

Eventually her teenage brain comes back to her and she snaps out of her trance, She totally got caught up in watching Sesame Street!

She takes the half-empty sippy cup of juice out of her mouth(Her aunt came in and gave it to her during the show) and looks around.

What happens next?
111123221322111212123312112121212.title: She gets sucked into some show for Preschoolers...

choices: Her Aunt reads her a Bedtime Story
It's off to Dreamland for Mimi
1111232213221112121233121121212121.content:
Mimi got lost in watching TV for so long it's Already Bathtime!

As soon as she got free of that Trance, she's already being lifted off the couch by her Aunt.

Her Aunt turns off the TV before carrying her into the toddleriffic bedroom she woke up in, and further into the adjoining bathroom.

Her Aunt sets her on a towel on the floor and tells her to put her arms up.

She reluctantly complies and soon her shirt is pulled off, then her aunt has her lie down.

Swiftly her sweatpants are removed, which reveals the poofy diaper underneath.

As her Aunt removes her diaper, she suddenly notices it was wet! She wet herself again while wtaching TV and didn't notice!

After removing the diaper Mia is placed into the bathtub, which is filled with Bubbles!

Even Mia's Teenage side can't help but want to have a little fun with a Bubble Bath.

Her Aunt then adds some bath toys, and Mimi gets to playing.

After playing/bathing for a while, Mimi's Bath comes to an end as she's rinsed off.

Her Aunt Picks her up in a towel and helps her dry off before the head into the bedroom.

Her Aunt takes the towel and lays it on the bed before motioning for Mimi to lie down on it.

Knowing the routine by now, she climbs onto the bed and lies down.

Her Aunt grabs some stuff off of the Dresser real quick, which turns out to be changing supplies.

But Mia does notice something new. Her Aunt has another Diaper, And it's not a normal one.

It's one of those Thicker Nighttime ones. Mia internally sinks a little, but she knows it's to be expected.

Luckily the diapering itself goes by quick.

Mia sits up and pokes at how poofy the Night diaper is, it's thick enough it even forces her legs apart a little.

Her Aunt grabs something else off the Dresser. It's another Pair of Footie Pajamas(like she woke up in)

Mia lifts her arms without being prompted, and lets her aunt dress her without issue.

Finally it's time for bed. Her Aunt hands her a Teddy Bear which she instinctively cuddles.

(She doesn't remember, but she was cuddling the same bear when she woke up earlier)

After being tucked into bed:
1111232213221112121233121121212121.title: It's Already Bathtime?

choices: As Mimi Sleeps, she gets Hypnotized some more
11112322132211121212331211212121212.content:
Her Aunt leaves Mimi to dreamland, leaving the door a crack open despite the Nightlight.

Try as she might, despite how early it is, Mia can't will her toddler body to stay up, and soon she falls asleep.

Does anything happen during the night?
11112322132211121212331211212121212.title: It's off to Dreamland for Mimi

choices: A: Become more like a Real Toddler
111123221322111212123312112121212122.content:
While Mimi has already been Hypnotized a little in addition to her Regression, she'll be Hypnotized a little more as she sleeps tonight.

So far she'll:

Wet Herself if she hears her aunt say "SPRING A LEAK"

Poop Herself if she hears her aunt say "MAKE A STINKY"

This time, the Hypnosis will:

A. Turn her Further into a Toddler(IE, Losing the Ability to Read etc.)

B. Remove her Potty Training(IE, becoming Suddenly Scared of the Potty etc.)
111123221322111212123312112121212122.title: As Mimi Sleeps, she gets Hypnotized some more

1111232213221112121233121121212121221.content:
So the Hypnosis will cause her to become more like a real toddler.

Your Options for how this works are:

A: Mimi forgets all those dumb long Big Girl Words(Her vocabulary is reduced to that of a Toddler)

B: Mimi's such a smart girl, she knows how to sound out words!(her Reading Skills are reduced to that of a kid learning to read)
1111232213221112121233121121212121221.title: A: Become more like a Real Toddler

1111232213221112121233121121212121222.content:
So the Hypnosis will cause her to be put further into diapers as she loses her Potty Training.

Your options for how this works are:

A: Mimi is instilled with a deep fear of the Potty that'll make her unable to use it.

B: Mimi is hypnotized into thinking the Potty and Pullups are Stupid, whild Diapers are awesome because she doesn't have to stop playing.
1111232213221112121233121121212121222.title: B: Lose more Potty Training

11112322132211121212331211212121212222.content:
As Mimi falls deep into slumber, a Soothing voice begins playing in her room, laced with Sumbliminal Messages and Hypnotic Suggestions.

"You don't want to use the potty, you want to keep playing."

Mia mumbles in her sleep: "Dun wanna potty, wanna play"

"Pullups are dumb, my diapers are better"

Once again, she mumbles: "Puwwups dumb, Diapies better"

"You love your Diapers, you don't have to stop playing!"

Mimi:"Wuv Diapies, dun gotta stop pwaying!

"If you need to pee-pee or poopy, you use your diaper, not some dumb potty!"

Mimi: "Pee-Pee or Poopy? Me use Diapie!"

These and other Phrases reapeat over the next couple hours, instilling Mimi's Subconcious with a love of Playing and Diapers, and a Disdain for Pullups and Having to stop Playing Go Potty. By the time the Voice stops, Mimi's a Full-Blown Potty Rebel who will fight Getting Potty Trained Tooth and Nail.

But maybe Mia(the Teenage Part of her) can still fight back? Who knows.

Anyways, Next:
11112322132211121212331211212121212222.title: B: The Potty is Stupid!

111123221322111212123312112121212122222.content:
Mia sleeps soundly through the night, and eventually the morning comes.

Her parents left this morning after she got on the bus for a long weekend, they left Mrs. Henderson in charge from down the street Layla has never met the woman but her parents assured her that she's nice and will be fun.
Getting off the bus at her house Layla was shocked to see her little brother Drew and little sister Mary standing next to what Layla could only determine was a giant. She slowly walked up to the very tall woman.
"Uh....are are you Mrs. Henderson?" Layla said nervously.
"Yes, and no reason to be shy little one. You must be Layla I've heard a lot about you. Run inside and change im going to take you kids to the park. How does that sound?" The 7 foot 7 inch 230 pound brunette with a large bust wearing a floral dress says happily picking up 2 year old Mary.

Both Mary and Drew cheered "Lay lay! Let's go play!" Layla nodded and followed Mrs. Henderson trying her best to keep up with the giants stride. Layla couldn't help but watch the giant woman as the headed towards the park, she felt like a tiny toddler barley taller than the woman's legs.

info.brief_description: A character is treated like a baby and not by choice
info.description:
In this interactive you will choose your character and the person, people, or thing that wants you to be a baby for them.

This is open to regression, hypnosis, being tricked into, or just fun humiliation

No sex, vor, or death please, but unbirth is ok.
